import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./form.css"; //icons import { FaDollarSign } from "react-icons/fa"; import { SlPeople } from "react-icons/sl"; const Form = ({ bill, setBill, tip, setTip, diners, setDiners }) => { const [isCustomSelected, setIsCustomSelected] = useState(false); const handleSelectedTip = (e) => { setTip(+e.target.value); setIsCustomSelected(e.target.value === "" ? false : true); }; return (
setBill(+e.target.value)} />

Seleted Tip %

{diners === 0 ? "Can't be zero" : " "}

setDiners(+e.target.value)} />
); }; export default Form;
